labelingSteps.text: Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the light (one switch, can be multiple lights).
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the light (one switch, can be multiple lights).
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the light (one switch, can be multiple lights).
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the light (one switch, can be multiple lights).

Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the light (one switch, can be multiple lights).
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, put the washing machine on a short cycle (40 degrees C) and turn on the machine.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the washing machine.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the dishwasher.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the dishwasher.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the iron.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the iron.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the water heater (water in the boiler should not be preheated and should be cold).
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the iron.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the grinder/blender.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the grinder/blender.
Put something in the microwave oven (e.g. a cup of water). Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the microwave oven on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the microwave oven.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the oven.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the oven.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the first ring on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the first ring.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the first ring on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the second ring on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the second ring.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the first ring.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the first ring on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the second ring on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the second ring.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the third ring on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the third ring.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the first ring.

Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the second ring on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the second ring.

Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the third ring.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the fourth ring on maximum power.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the fourth ring.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the first ring.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the hair dryer.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the hair dryer.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the air conditioning unit on cooling.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the air conditioning unit.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the air conditioning unit on heating.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the air conditioning unit.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the vacuum cleaner.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the vacuum cleaner.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the television.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, change a channel.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, change a channel.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, change a channel.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the television.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the radio/Hi-Fi/computer.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the radio/Hi-Fi/computer.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn on the heating element.
Press the START button. When the circle turns blue, turn off the heating element.
